SENT.plain: Two patients with Wiedemann-Beckwith-Syndrome and neonatal hypoglycemia are reported
The etiology for the impaired glucose metabolism has not been elucitated as yet
In some patients pancreatic islet-cell hyperplasia resulting in hyperinsulinemic hypoglycemia was suspected
Increased somatomedin activity was also proposed
We have measured somatomedin concentrations in both patients by bioassay and radioimmunoassay and found normal or slightly reduced plasma levels with both methods
